description: Throughout my career as a programmer, I have worked on numerous personal and professional projects. I believe it is essential for a programmer to always have personal projects to engage with, as the knowledge gained from one can often be adapted and applied to another.

Behind each card, you will find information about my roles and the most relevant aspects of each project. You will also have access to GitHub links to explore the code, direct links to the product, details about the technologies used, and my role in the development.

projects.name: CODERE NEWCO
projects.description: Responsible for developing applications for the loyalty club. We use a powerful architecture (ARCA) to encapsulate REDUX. I integrated the core part of this architecture myself. I also kept dependencies up to date and integrated native functionalities into plugins to ensure clean and structured code.

children.name: Mi Codere
children.description: Improved overall performance using @defer and independent loaders. The app features a communication layer with Electron, reusable components, and animation implementations using CSS, Ionic Animations, and Angular Animations.

children.name: Codere LATAM
children.description: The apps are built on a robust architecture that unifies code across multiple applications in Latin America, making maintenance easier, improving scalability, and reducing development time. Successfully handled push notifications across all scenarios and systems.

children.name: Push Agent
children.description: Developed a push notification management system. It includes a custom-built server, an internal database (Derby), and a mechanism for sending push notifications at no cost. The system uses its own internal communication protocol and exposes endpoints, WebSockets, and file ingestion for integration with external systems.

children.name: ARCA
children.description: ARCA (Automatic REDUX Core Architecture) is a technical framework that encapsulates NgRx. I extracted the software into a standalone library and replaced NgRx dependencies with a custom REDUX implementation, making it significantly lighter and faster.

projects.name: LTA+
projects.description: Aerospace calculation application for military operations. A technical challenge that led me to take on a leadership role, create custom plugins, develop automation scripts, and implement file security measures.

children.name: LTA+
children.description: Developed the application from scratch, making key decisions regarding the technical architecture and communication between modules.

children.name: E2E Testsuit
children.description: Own initiative. End-to-end (E2E) testing architecture for iOS applications. Dynamically builds tests based on an Excel file, allowing non-technical staff to modify tests easily.

children.name: Filesystem Fork
children.description: Fork of the official Ionic Filesystem plugin with added support for Electron. The project required file operations on Windows and iOS. Since no suitable alternatives were available, we iterated on the official plugin and added additional functionality.

children.name: EFB SFTP
children.description: Native implementation of the SFTP (SSH File Transfer Protocol), integrated for both Electron and iOS.

children.name: EFB ZIP
children.description: Native plugin for file compression and decompression operations. Supports password management and is implemented for Electron and iOS.

projects.name: Fitness Hub
projects.description: Hybrid application. Tracks your water intake, steps, weight, and supplements. Free, ad-free, and 100% offline. Make fitness an easy and accessible habit!

children.name: Fitness Hub (APP)
children.description: Hybrid tracking, fitness, and health app. I handled the entire process—from design to architecture, including publishing on the app stores. Additionally, I developed a strategy to grow the user base, scale the business, and implement monetization.

children.name: Pedometer
children.description: Custom plugin for native layer interaction. Manages step counting (Android-only).

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal website: A space where I showcase all my projects, design my resumes, and share opinions and experiences on my blog.

children.name: Porfolio
children.description: Development, design, and deployment. Dynamically generates content based on JSON files, making it highly flexible for adding new experiences, projects, or blog articles.

children.name: Blog
children.description: A place to write about my interests—technology, fitness, fashion, entertainment, and more. Uses Markdown to create posts, ensuring a smooth and convenient writing process.

projects.name: Demiurge
projects.description: The word 'Demiurge' comes from the Greek 'dēmiourgós' meaning 'maker,' 'artisan,' 'producer,' and ultimately, 'creator.' Demiurge is a set of utilities designed to streamline my workflows and automate processes.

children.name: Demiurge
children.description: Component library to accelerate Angular application development, specifically tailored for hybrid applications.

children.name: Youtube2ivooX
children.description: Automation of the process for downloading and extracting audio from YouTube, then uploading it to iVoox.

projects.name: Blazebooks
projects.description: Dive into interactive stories where every choice impacts the plot and character behavior.

children.name: Blazebooks
children.description: Mobile and web application for reading interactive books. Features a technical architecture designed to interpret interactive stories in an abstract way.

children.name: Blaze Server
children.description: NodeJS/NestJS server that manages users, handles files, and administers the database. Hosted on a dedicated local PC, separate from the frontend.

children.name: Blazebooks (old)
children.description: Old application. Native. It was my final degree project. I received top honors.

children.name: P4RZ1V4L
children.description: Terminal-based environment for backtesting trading bots. Includes genetic algorithms and other systems to fine-tune input parameters. Uses an architecture that abstracts the backtesting process.

children.name: L4NC3L0T
children.description: Automated trading bot. Executes trading strategies autonomously within a terminal environment.

children.name: Trading Bots
children.description: Collection of bots designed to operate with MultiCharts.

projects.name: Legacy
projects.description: Collection of old, unrelated projects. Some of them were very useful for building certain architectural components and acquiring new knowledge.

children.name: Rainclouds Web
children.description: Website for the Atmospheric Black Metal band RAZAK. It was in production for several years.

children.name: Retro Games
children.description: Retro arcade game application. The goal was to offer a collection of classic games optimized for mobile devices. To integrate Phaser with Angular, I had to build an architecture component based on RXJS. This component has remained a core part of all the systems I've integrated since, due to its usefulness and versatility.

children.name: Stoic Manager
children.description: Personal management application inspired by Stoic principles. Designed to help users organize their daily tasks.

children.name: Battle of Numbers
children.description: Terminal-based game. Developed using Termux on a mobile phone. It has no dependencies.
